lines.text: One million in each envelope. Twenty envelopes, that's twenty million! Uh, Italian lire, but that's better than nothing...
Marvelous guy. There's no one better than Salvatore at bringing home the salami.

[having just frisked a woman who turned out to be a man]
It's funny, you don't look Jewish.

[having tied his dream woman to a bed]
You fell into my diabolical trap, you gorgeous dummy. And now I'm going to investigate yours.
We'll plunge together into a crimson lake!
First you gotta plunge into something else.

[to her dog Othello]
You're a male chauvinist mutt!
